title: Specify the font
content:
Hi all!

Just want to apologize for my bad English.

People, help please learn to find, identify what kind of font file attached.

Need just such as in the picture.

For earlier grateful.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822095221im_/http:/typophile.com/files/123_4039.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [123.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822095221/http:/typophile.com/files/123_0.jpg) | 13.24 KB |
author: Dealaxer

comments.content:
The search term you probably want is "dot matrix."

[WL Asteroids Old](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822095221/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/writlarge/rasteroids-old/) is pretty close:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822095221im_/http:/typophile.com/files/7bd12be0ccc6249e996d977897d74c_4166.gif)

**[Tandysoft](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822095221/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Tandysoft%20-%20Regular&fid=4e6ae269022cf7f706a5e7a0a981e77c&fsize=60&text=MILITARY&wrap=2)** pixel font by Neale Davidson [2011, Free for personal use] looks like a match
**monmeehan, fvilanakis** thank you very much, this is what you need!
